root.name: Painkiller: Redemption
root.description: Overview Redemption uses an updated version of the original Painkiller engine (developed by People Can Fly) and features six new levels with "over 6000 enemies". Players can play as either Daniel Garner or Belial. It was due for release on Feb. 14, 2011 for PC through various digital distribution platforms including Steam, but it was delayed until February 25th. The launch price was $4.99.
